oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Schools; Educational facilities
Education; Education - Tennessee; Education - History - Tennessee; School buildings - Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Front and side views of Chestnut Grove School in Macon County. The building is wood with vertical boards.
The back of the photograph indicates this school was to be replaced by a "new, modern one-teacher building."
